Key Match Events: Anastasios Bakasetas scored the winning goal in the 48th minute
Petros Mantalos scored the final goal in added time
Pre-Game Insights: Greece came into the game on the back of an emotionally charged 2-1 win over England at Wembley on Thursday, a day after the death of their former teammate George Baldock
Post-Match Reflections: The Greeks top Group B2 on 12 points, three ahead of second-placed England, who won 3-1 away to Finland
Ireland stay third on three points with Finland bottom on zero
Miscellaneous Highlights: An impeccably observed minute's silence before kick-off
Ireland's Caoimhin Kelleher kept his side in the game with four important saves in the first half
